医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
科学家发现自主呼吸控制的大脑回路深吸一口气，缓慢呼气……我们可以通过放慢呼吸来自我安抚，这不是很奇怪吗？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Scientists-discover-brain-circle-for-voluntory-breathing-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Scientists-discover-brain-circle-for-voluntory-breathing-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89f16f20-01db-4783-9b79-96dd8ae57e11 Wed, 20 Nov 2024 07:33:04 -0500 Scientists discover brain circuit for voluntary breathing control
使用耳机麦克风发现阿尔茨海默氏症的早期迹象阿尔茨海默病影响着全世界超过 5000 万人，常常给患者及其家人和亲人带来毁灭性的打击。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Using-earpiece-microphones-to-spot-early-signs-of-Alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Using-earpiece-microphones-to-spot-early-signs-of-Alzheimers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9427e7a6-f0da-4764-a9ba-684e53e2f2f5 Wed, 20 Nov 2024 07:22:58 -0500 Using earpiece microphones to spot early signs of Alzheimer's

使用基于 CRISPR 的新系统对小细胞外囊泡进行条形码编码借助涉及 CRISPR 基因编辑技术的新方法，现在可以以全新的方式分析通过作为信使和载体的纳米颗粒进行的细胞间通讯。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Barcoding-small-extracellular-vesicles-with-new-CRISPR-based-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Barcoding-small-extracellular-vesicles-with-new-CRISPR-based-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15e1dae2-addf-40fb-b780-e993b4bd119d Wed, 20 Nov 2024 07:21:06 -0500 Barcoding small extracellular vesicles with new CRISPR-based system
可以训练人工智能模型来区分脑肿瘤和健康组织牛津大学出版社发表在《生物学方法和方案》上的一篇新论文表明，科学家可以训练人工智能模型来区分脑肿瘤和健康组织。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/AI-models-can-be-trained-to-distinguish-brain-tumors-from-healthy-tissue.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/AI-models-can-be-trained-to-distinguish-brain-tumors-from-healthy-tissue.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4912d47e-2269-41c3-93a8-c185bde29499 Wed, 20 Nov 2024 07:15:01 -0500 AI models can be trained to distinguish brain tumors from healthy tissue
泡菜被发现可以显着减少体内脂肪并对抗肥胖全球约 16% 的人口，即约 8.9 亿人患有肥胖症。世界卫生组织 (WHO) 已认识到肥胖是一个重大的健康问题，并强调其对世界各地个人的生活质量和整体健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Kimchi-found-to-significantly-reduce-body-fat-and-combat-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Kimchi-found-to-significantly-reduce-body-fat-and-combat-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73519ecd-dab9-4a2a-9721-22ec3fc1c041 Wed, 20 Nov 2024 06:33:46 -0500 Kimchi found to significantly reduce body fat and combat obesity
细颗粒物与较高的​​湿疹风险相关研究人员探讨了接触细颗粒物与湿疹风险之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Fine-pativity-matter-linked-to-higher-eczema-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Fine-pativity-matter-linked-to-higher-eczema-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26af3e8b-4d2e-463c-95fb-f2fae8e6eb51 Wed, 20 Nov 2024 06:33:00 -0500 Fine particulate matter linked to higher eczema risk
在预测死亡和心脏病风险方面，心肺健康优于体重指数随着美国肥胖率（按体重指数 (BMI) 定义）持续攀升，减肥努力也在不断增加，包括新时代的减肥药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Cardiorespiratory-fitness-trumps-BMI-in-predicting-risk-of-death-and-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Cardiorespiratory-fitness-trumps-BMI-in-predicting-risk-of-death-and-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d15a9ff7-84b0-475d-bf03-7fc96c647fd9 Wed, 20 Nov 2024 06:28:50 -0500 Cardiorespiratory fitness trumps BMI in predicting risk of death and heart disease
创造力营提高抑郁症青少年的幸福感由明尼苏达大学医学院领导的一个研究小组发表在《儿童精神病学和人类发展》杂志上，发现创造力营是一项为期两周的日间营艺术干预活动，对患有以下疾病的青少年的心理健康和福祉产生了积极影响：沮丧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Creativity-camp-boosts-well-being-in-teens-with-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Creativity-camp-boosts-well-being-in-teens-with-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b330ee68-6da1-4795-a08c-1523f7cc98fb Wed, 20 Nov 2024 06:16:03 -0500 Creativity camp boosts well-being in teens with depression
专家确定儿童脑部视觉障碍的五个要素美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 召集的专家们确定了大脑疾病的五个要素，这种疾病已成为美国和其他工业化国家从儿童时期开始视力障碍的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Experts-identify- Five-elements-of-brain-based-visual-impairment-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Experts-identify- Five-elements-of-brain-based-visual-impairment-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=458bccab-1225-4b41-af17-5cd4c9684058 Wed, 20 Nov 2024 06:12:25 -0500 Experts identify five elements of brain-based visual impairment in children
